body_html: I don't think I've actually seen an application that sets CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER on its own. Usually this would be set in the environment before launching the application, perhaps in combination with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.
body_text: I don't think I've actually seen an application that sets CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER on its own.  Usually this would be set in the environment before launching the application, perhaps in combination with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.
body: I don't think I've actually seen an application that sets CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER on its own.  Usually this would be set in the environment before launching the application, perhaps in combination with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.
